title: The dying speech of Robert Frances of Grays-Inn, Esq., July 24, 1685 delivered by his own hand to the ordinary, at the place of execution, desiring the same might be published.
author: Frances, Robert, d. 1685.
notes: Robert Frances was convicted of the murder of Thomas Dangerfield. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
